## GAD-7 vs SRP

In the field of psychology, the utilization of standardized assessments like the GAD-7 or SRP has become an essential part of diagnosis and treatment planning. The Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) is a tool used to evaluate the extent of an individual's anxiety, while the Self Report of Psychopathy (SRP) allows for the assessment of psychopathic traits. A comparative study between GAD-7 and SRP can offer unique insights into patientsâ€™ mental states. The Harmony software provides a streamlined approach to this process of comparison, colloquially referred to as GAD-7 vs SRP. Harmony, equipped with a sophisticated AI model that uses natural language processing, takes the hassle out of the tedious task of harmonisation. Comparing GAD-7 vs SRP manually can be a painstaking process, given the number of variables in each test. Harmony, on the other hand, provides a percentage match between each item present in the GAD-7 and SRP, delivering the data conveniently to psychologists who can then make a better-informed judgement. The Harmony software enables psychologists to unleash the full potential of their data by making comparisons both within and across studies. Consistent findings across multiple studies can contribute significantly to the field of psychology. Therefore, it is highly recommended for the psychological researchers keen on drawing comparisons between different questionnaires to utilize the Harmony software. With its comprehensive database and user-friendly interface, the task of harmonising and analysing GAD-7 vs SRP has never been easier.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and SRP

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and SRP into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SRP into Harmony</a> - compare SRP with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
